jukugoList.components: 保 (guarantee/maintain ) + 守 (protect) + 主義 (- ism) = 保守主義 (conservative)
留 (absent / stopped) + 守 (protect) = 留守 (be away)
看 (observe/guard) + 守 (protect) = 看守 (prison guard)
暴力 (violence) + 団 (group) = 暴力団 (the official term for Yakuza. )
集 (collect) + 団 (group) = 集団 (group)
団 (group) + 子 (child) = お団子 (dumpling kebab)
切 (cut / important) + 符 (ticket) = 切符 (tickeｔ)
村 (hicktown) + 長 (long / boss) = 村長 (village chief)
寿 (lifespan/sushi) + 司 (administer) = 寿司 (sushi)
寿 (lifespan/sushi) + 命 (life) = 寿命 (life span)
慰 (console) + 安 (cheap / safe) + 婦 (housewife / lady) = 慰安婦 ("comfort women")
慰 (console) + 謝 (apologize) + 料 (ingredients / fees) = 慰謝料 (compensation money, alimony.)

kunyomiList.definition: ask- basically it's the same as 聞く, but you'd be more likely to use 尋ねる when asking a clerk something at a store. They're both really casual, but 尋ねる is a bit more businesslike. 1/2 KANA
to lead or guide - in the sense of MORAL guidance, reforming a juvenile delinquent, to lead by example, etc.

jukugoList.components: 誘 (invite / entice) + 導 (lead) = 誘導 (lead)
導 (lead) + 入 (put/go in) = 導入 (introduce new concept)

kunyomiList.definition: fight - (only used figuratively) - struggle against temptation, war on poverty, the, uh, the uh, hold on, the effin' war on drugs, struggle against prejudice, etc.

jukugoList.components: 戦 (fight) + 闘 (struggle) = 戦闘 (a battle)
闘 (struggle) + 志 (intention, volition) = 闘志 (fightin' spirit)
詩 (poem) + 人 (person) = 詩人 (poet)
詩 (poem) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 詩的 (poetic)

kunyomiList.definition: time, as in 'That time your mom shaved her beard.'

jukugoList.components: 四 (the numeral 4) + 時 (time) = 四時 (4 o'clock)
四時 (4 o'clock) + 間 (a period of time) = 四時間 (4 hours' time)
何 (what?!?) + 時 (time) = 何時 (what time is it?)
時 (time) + 間 (a period of time) = 時間 (time)
同 (same) + 時 (time) = 同時 (at the same time)

kunyomiList.definition: to hold, but also to own, and often, to bring. As in 'Buy some nachos and bring them to the party.'

jukugoList.components: 金 (gold) + 持 (hold) = 金持ち (rich person)
気 (mood) + 持 (hold) = 気持ち (feels good!)
維 (upkeep) + 持 (hold) = 維持 (ｍａｉｎｔａｉｎ　ｏｒ　ｓｕｓｔａｉｎ)

kunyomiList.stars: （BOOBOO: most of the time, Japanese don't say samurai, they'll say 武士　（ぶし） instead. The only time actual Japanese say "samurai" is when they're referring to something very concrete things like "samurai haircut" or "Samurai TV drama."） 1/2 KANA

kunyomiList.definition: equivalent : usually in the mathematical sense, but can also be used figuratively, "He's as good as dead!" "Your lies are tantamount to treason, and I'll see you hanged!!" This is closer to the non-judgemental 同じ than it is to the moralistic 公平　（fair)

jukugoList.components: 平 (equal / level) + 等 (equal /etc./plural) = 平等 (impartial, even)
尊敬 (respect) + 語 (language) = 尊敬語 (formal Japanese)
尊 (esteem) + 敬 (respect) = 尊敬 (respect)
男 (man) + 尊 (esteem) + 女 (woman) + 卑 (despicable) = 男尊女卑 (sexism)

kunyomiList.definition: father,(which is weird, considering that chichi also means 'tits,' which is basically what the 'mother' kanji depicts. So why isn't 'mama' called chichi?)

jukugoList.components: 父 (dad) + 親 (parents/kindness) = 父親 (father)
父 (dad) + 母 (your Moms) = 父母 (mama-papa )

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( が or に ) まじ＊わる

kunyomiList.definition: I mix things together . Also used figuratively, as in joining or associating with a group.

jukugoList.components: 交 (combine) + 換 (exchange) = 交換 (exchange)
交 (combine) + 通 (pass) = 交通 (traffic)
絶 (extinct) + 対 (against) = 絶対 (absolutely, without fail)
反 (anti) + 対 (against) = 反対 (against it!!!!!!!!!!)
対 (against) + 策 (take measures) = 対策 (counter-plan / counter-measure)
反対 (against it!!!!!!!!!!) + 派 (faction/bling) = 反対派 (the opposing faction)
高 (tall) + 校 (school) = 高校 (high school)
学 (knowledge) + 校 (school) = 学校 (school)
専門 (a specialty) + 学校 (school) = 専門学校 (trade school)
中 (middle) + 学校 (school) = 中学校 (middle school)
高校 (high school) + 生 (life / birth) = 高校生 (high school student)
小 (small size) + 学校 (school) = 小学校 (elementary school)
郊 (suburb) + 外 (outside) = 郊外 (suburb)

kunyomiList.definition: xxx is effective, most often said about medicine or drugs.

jukugoList.components: 効果 (an effect) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 効果的 (effective)
効 (effective) + 果 (fruit　/ result) = 効果 (an effect)
効 (effective) + 率 (ratio) = 効率のいい (efficient)
逆 (opposite) + 効果 (an effect) = 逆効果 (the opposite effect )

kunyomiList.definition: I strangle - not just like murder, but to wring out a towel or squish a sponge or something

jukugoList.components: 専 (specialty) + 門 (gate) = 専門 (a specialty)
専 (specialty) + 攻 (attack) = 専攻 (major)
博 (museum　/extensive) + 物 (animal / thing) + 館 (big hall) = 博物館 (museum)
博 (museum　/extensive) + 覧 (view) + 会 (big meeting) = 博覧会 (exposition)

kunyomiList.definition: To bind something - to tie a string AROUND something - to shackle a prisoner, to tie up a masochist, to put one's hair in a pony tail (BOOBOO: to tie a knot is 結ぶ　（むすぶ））. 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 束 (bundle of sticks) + 縛 (tie up) = 束縛 (restrain)

kunyomiList.definition: weak or thin flavor. A cup of coffee with one bean.

jukugoList.components: 薄 (weak or thin) + 情 (emotion) = 薄情 (cold-hearted )
演 (performance) + 奏 (musical performance) = 演奏 (perform)
講 (lecture) + 演 (performance) = 講演 (a non-political speech)
演 (performance) + 歌 (sing) = 演歌 (enka)

kunyomiList.definition: to be blessed with xxx (good looks, a talent for dope rhymes, etc.)

jukugoList.components: 知 (know) + 恵 (do a favor) = 知恵 (wisdom)

jukugoList.postparticles: のある or をつける
jukugoList.components: 悪 (bad) + 知恵 (wisdom) = 悪知恵 (cunning, crafty)

kunyomiList.definition: to spread out (a tarpaulin), to lay out (railroad tracks)

jukugoList.components: 敷 (lay out / site) + 金 (gold) = 敷金 (deposit money)
オ () + 屋 (store) + 敷 (lay out / site) = オバケ屋敷 (Haunted House!)
映 (project, reflect) + 画 (a drawing) = 映画 (movie)
漫 (manga) + 画 (a drawing) = 漫画 (manga)

画 (a drawing) + 面 (front surface / face) = 画面 (screen)

両 (both) + 替 (substitute) = 両替 (make change)
両 (both) + 親 (parents/kindness) = 両親 (both parents )

kunyomiList.definition: to fill up, either literally or metaphorically (e.g. to satisfy or fulfill)

jukugoList.components: 満 (full) + 足 (foot/ be enough) = 満足 (to be totally satisfied.)
満 (full) + 員 (clerk) = 満員 (all full up!)
満 (full) + 月 (moon) = 満月 (full moon)
肥 (obese / manure) + 満 (full) = 肥満 (obesity)

出 (pull out / hand over) + 口 (mouth) = 出口 (exit.)

1039.eng: yield, get out of the way

発 (launch) + 掘 (dig) = 発掘 (excavation )

kunyomiList.definition: I shake or shock something : I make something sway
something gets a jolt, something sways
to shock , jolt, to make something sway or shake

to separate, to detach, to keep separate

kunyomiList.definition: arrow - never used by itself (see below!) NUBI

kunyomiList.definition: to know something or someone. (BOOBOO: as opposed to 分かります, which means 'Oh shit! now I get it!' or 'I just realized / comprehended something!')
I don't know. (as opposed to "分からない" which means, 'i don't get it.')

jukugoList.components: 知 (know) + 識 (be conscious) = 知識 (knowledge)

kunyomiList.definition: to miss out on. Like you were watching tv too much and missed out on a pool party in your own backyard.

kunyomiList.definition: to watch something, deliberately and for a long time, In other words, to be a spectator at something (only used in the phrase 観にいく . And you only used 観に行く about concerts, broadway plays, and art exhibitions).

電 (electricity) + 車 (car) = 電車 (train)
自 (my own) + 転 (roll over) + 車 (car) = 自転車 (bicycle)
救 (rescue) + 急 (urgent) + 車 (car) = 救急車 (ambulance)

to get piled up, to get a backlog - to go further and further (into debt)

二 (two) + 重 (heavy / overlap) = 二重 (double-xxx)

kunyomiList.definition: it drips, dangles. Also used as the action verb for piss, shit, fart. Seriously, even fart. A fun curse to use when frustrated is is ウンコ垂れ！(literally, "Dangling turd!") 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 垂 (drip, dangle) + 直 (correct a probem / direct contact) = 垂直 (vertical, but also means perpendicular.)

kunyomiList.definition: can mean ring, like rings of saturn, or loop, like cable which is stored in a loop, or circle, like folk-dances where everyone forms a circle. But 輪 is never an actual ring like you wear on your finger. NUBI

kunyomiList.definition: usually used in the phrase : 時間が経つ・ time passes. Usually a long time. Like, "After three days, the letter arrived."

jukugoList.components: 経 (experience) + 験 (test) = 経験 (experience)

jukugoList.definition: the economy (経済学（けいざいがく）= economics)
jukugoList.components: 経 (experience) + 済 (economy / to be over) = 経済 (the economy (経済学（けいざいがく）= economics))
経験 (experience) + 者 (professional) = 経験者 (survivor)
神 (GOD kanji) + 経 (experience) = 神経 (nerve cell)

kunyomiList.definition: suspicious. Not like "I'm suspicious of him," but like "He's acting shady."

jukugoList.components: 怪 (suspicious) + 獣 (beast) = 怪獣 (Godzilla monster)
怪 (suspicious) + 我 (we) = 怪我 (scar)
